channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jerome Powell says Gen Z without tech skills are getting crushed in the ’low-hire, low-fire’ job market—and colleges are failing them
item.description: While a major economic issue, there’s not much the Fed can do about that, he said.

item.title: Stanford scientists warn that AI ‘workslop’ is a stealthy threat to productivity—and a giant time suck
item.description: Lazy AI-generated work and communication is not only slowing people down; it’s also leading employees to lose respect for each other. Here’s how to pr...

item.title: One big winner of Trump’s H1-B crackdown could be Canada
item.description: Every time new H1-B restrictions appear, jobs go to Canada.

item.title: OpenAI, Oracle, and Softbank expand Stargate with five new AI data centers, staging Texas media spectacle to counter critics
item.description: The companies drew reporters to rural West Texas to tour their flagship site and announce five new data centers. The show of force, timed with Oracle’...

item.title: Oracle founder Larry Ellison has pledged to give away 95% of his $393B fortune—but sudden leadership changes fuel a mystery
item.description: Ellison has a history of changing his plans for distributing wealth.

item.title: Why what Jimmy Kimmel says or doesn’t say tonight is of little import to Disney
